bio.en:
IтАЩm Sudip Sharma, a full-stack developer who believes technology is more than code тАФ itтАЩs a bridge between ideas and impact. From an early curiosity about how things work to a professional pursuit of building scalable, user-focused solutions, IтАЩve always been driven by a desire to learn, create, and grow.

My mission is simple: to be happy and spread happiness through my work and interactions. Whether itтАЩs solving complex technical challenges or exploring new technologies, I approach every project with creativity, curiosity, and a commitment to excellence.

I see every line of code as an opportunity to craft something meaningful тАФ to make systems smarter, users happier, and life a little better through innovation and thoughtful design.

description.en: As a Backend Developer, my main responsibilities include developing scalable and efficient backend solutions while ensuring system performance and reliability. I actively collaborate in open-source projects and contribute to organizational development events. I focus on using modern tools and frameworks to build full-stack applications and integrate advanced technologies. My work also involves exploring innovative solutions such as containerization and AI integration to enhance product capability and user experience. I continue to expand my skills and update my knowledge as I grow in this field.

Gained hands-on experience in backend structuring, API management, and deploying scalable full-stack applications with strong focus on security, error handling, and performance.

description.en: Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot that combines NestJS backend, Hugging Face LLM models, and vector databases to deliver highly relevant AI responses. Chat context is maintained using Redis, and knowledge embeddings are stored in Supabase for fast and scalable retrieval.

en: ЁЯТкRAG Architecture: Retrieves relevant knowledge from vector embeddings to augment AI responses.
1я╕ПтГгMulti-response LLM: Generates different AI responses based on context and user queries.

ЁЯСМRedis Integration: Maintains chat context and history for personalized conversations.

description.en: A modern, full-featured blogging platform designed with robust security and seamless user experience in mind. The application supports CRUD operations for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts, allowing users to manage content efficiently. It features user authentication to ensure secure access, and role-based access control to differentiate permissions for admins, authors, and regular users. Built with scalability and maintainability in mind, this app provides a clean, intuitive interface and a reliable backend for managing content dynamically.

description.en: A modern, full-featured blogging platform designed with robust security and seamless user experience in mind. The application supports CRUD operations for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts, allowing users to manage content efficiently. It features user authentication to ensure secure access, and role-based access control to differentiate permissions for admins, authors, and regular users. Built with scalability and maintainability in mind, this app provides a clean, intuitive interface and a reliable backend for managing content dynamically.
